entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:01 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 7. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
